publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-17 Mr Jamie Stone: Giving Scottish Business a Competitive Edge—That the Parliament believes that the business rate poundage should be set below the levels in the rest of the United Kingdom for the term of this Parliament to give Scottish businesses a competitive edge. Supported by: Tavish Scott*, Jim Hume*, Jim Tolson*, Alison McInnes*, Liam McArthur*, Jeremy Purvis*, Iain Smith*, Margaret Smith*, Mike Rumbles*, Mike Pringle*, John Farquhar Munro*, Robert Brown*, Ross Finnie*, Nicol Stephen*, Hugh O’Donnell*

S3M-17 Mr Jamie Stone: Giving Scottish Business a Competitive Edge—That the Parliament believes that the business rate poundage should be set below the levels in the rest of the United Kingdom for the term of this Parliament to give Scottish businesses a competitive edge. Supported by: Tavish Scott, Jim Hume, Jim Tolson, Alison McInnes, Liam McArthur, Jeremy Purvis, Iain Smith, Margaret Smith, Mike Rumbles, Mike Pringle, John Farquhar Munro, Robert Brown, Ross Finnie, Nicol Stephen, Hugh O’Donnell
